akas: William and Sparkles' Magical Tales Australia (long title)
akas from release info: William and Sparkles' Magical Tales Australia (long title)

1.title: The Here to There Challenge
1.plot: Sparkles and William accidentally damage King Fuddy Duddy's crown while polishing it. When they try to put it together again, the two broken parts duplicate. William and Sparkles opt to wear one crown each, and soon learn that having too many monarchs means one mighty muddle!

4.title: Whirly Wizard
4.plot: The story of how Sparkles and William meet the Whirly Windy Wizard.

5.title: The Sad Clown
5.plot: It's a beautiful day and Sparkles & William are playing out in the garden. They hear a noise and, when they investigate, they find their friend Buttons the Clown sitting on the ground feeling decidedly unfunny. Buttons is terribly sad because he has lost his Funny-Bone, and without it, his sense of humor has gone too. "What good is a clown who can't make people laugh?" Sparkles and William try everything they can think of to restore Buttons' sense of humor - jokes, song & dance, silly props, even the 'All-Purpose, Slap-Happy, Silly Spell' - but nothing seems to work. ...

7.title: The Last Rainbow
7.plot: When William and Sparkles struggle to imagine a perfect present for the Queen of the Fairies, they decide that gold will be the answer to their troubles. William attempts to summon a Leprechaun's pot of gold from a magical book.But the pair get more than they bargained for when they don't only call forth the pot of gold, but its Leprechaun owner, and a special, magical rainbow. The last of its kind in the world...

8.title: King of the Enchanted Forest
8.plot: When Sparkles dresses up as the Queen of the Fairies, William mistakes her for the real deal. Sparkles can't resist stringing him along until she can't keep a straight face any longer. William sees the joke and promises he'll play a trick back on Sparkles. Soon after, Sparkles is visited by the King of the Forest, King Bling. Sparkles thinks it's William in disguise. She makes cheeky comments about his 'costume' and declines to pay him the proper respect. When William himself turns up Sparkles realises her visitor really is the King! Poor Sparkles just wants to hide ...

9.title: A Giant Problem
9.plot: Sparkles startles William as he practices a newly-created spell. Jack arrives with a mystery sack and asks Sparkles and William to mind it for him while he runs another errand. The contents of the sack attracts the attention of an angry Giant. Williams uses his new spell to repel the Giant. When Jack returns with two large sacks of gold Sparkles and William realize what he's been up to, and also why the Giant was so angry. Sparkles comes up with a solution to the dilemma, which makes the Giant happy and teaches Jack a valuable lesson.

11.title: The Frog Prince
11.plot: Sparkles & William get a visit from a young prince who needs their help. He explains that he used to be a frog but an evil witch turned him into a handsome prince. Now he wants to go back to being a frog. Sparkles and William perform the spell but only once the strict conditions set out in The Fairy Code are met. Later that day, the arrival of a lovelorn Princess changes everything and Sparkles and William set out to search the forest, find the frog, and put everything right.

12.title: The Pillow of Napping
12.plot: William, Sparkles and Goldilocks seek the magical Pillow of Napping.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

14.title: The Jolly Genie
14.plot: Sparkles & William find a strange object in the Enchanted Forest. They can't tell what it is because it is so muddy, so they take it home to clean it up. It turns out to be a crystal ball and as they scrub it clean a Genie appears. The Genie is terribly homesick because he has been trapped in his bubble prison and hasn't seen his family for a long, long time. Even so, the Genie grants Sparkles & William the customary Three Wishes. William inadvertently uses up the first two wishes cheaply and the Genie asks if Sparkles and William know of a spell that can send him ...

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

17.title: Oh, Fairy Godmother!?
17.plot: Sparkles & William meet the Fairy Godmother in the forest. She is boarding up her booth and is considering running away. Over a nice cup of moonbeam tea she tells Sparkles & William how her heavy workload is running her down and if she doesn't get a holiday soon she'll have to retire. Sparkles offers to stand-in for her for a day while William spoils her with some relaxing diversions. On the job, Sparkles gets to understand why the Fairy Godmother is so overworked - "These Princess are all such PRINCESSES!" Sparkles finds the solution that will lighten the Fairy ...

22.title: The Grand Ball
22.plot: Tonight is the Grand Spell-caster's Ball at the castle of King Fuddy-Duddy, and Sparkles is very excited about getting her invitation. But, for some reason, William seems less than excited and makes excuses to get out of the house. A concerned Sparkles searches and finds William practicing spells in the forest and uncovers the real reason for his lack of enthusiasm. King Fuddy-Duddy solves William's dilemma and everyone's happy.

23.title: Magical Fairy Dust
23.plot: While getting the Star House ready for a visit from the Queen of the Fairies, Sparkles runs out of magic fairy dust. The Queen arrives, but instead of helping Sparkles with her dilemma, she sends her on a quest to the deepest part of the Enchanted Forest to fetch the rare Fairy Floss Flower. After a long trek Sparkles and William find the flower - but capturing it proves a tricky task. Thanks to Sparkles' perseverance, they succeed and bring the flower to the Queen. It is only then that the royal fairy reveals that Sparkles' courage, persistence, good sense and ...

24.title: The Cauldron Bug
24.plot: There is a problem in the Star House. The cauldron is doing strange things and making weird noises. Sparkles & William consult the Spell Book who suggests they send for Felix the Fix-it Fellow to fix it for them. Felix arrives and diagnoses that the cauldron has a bug. Everything becomes more difficult when Felix is inadvertently sucked into the depths of the cauldron and can't get out. Now, while Felix tries to catch the bug from within, William & Sparkles have to find a way to get Felix out.

25.title: Witch Way
25.plot: Sparkles and William are honored by a visit from magic potions guru Auntie May, the wise witch. She needs to borrow their cauldron to cook up 'a special secret recipe'. At first William is not too happy about a witch visiting their house, but Sparkles promises Auntie May is cool. As Auntie May works on her secret recipe, Sparkles and William hang around hoping to learn some magic tips, while in the process supplying the vital ingredients: butter, sugar, flour and milk. When Auntie May gets stumped on the last ingredient. Sparkles is sure she can help with the answer. ...

26.title: The Messy Robot
26.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

29.title: Huggy Monster
29.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

30.title: The Trickiest Trickster
30.plot: While trying to fly, William takes off his Wizbang Belt and accidentally leaves it in The Enchanted Forest. Elvin the mischievous Elf finds it and William and Sparkles have to solve Elvin's riddles to get it back. Elvin tries to make his clues and hiding places as difficult as possible so he can become 'The Trickiest Trickster Ever' and get his name in the 'Enchanted Forest's Big Book of Records'.

33.title: More Awesome
33.plot: While Sparkles in out of the house, William gets a visit from Awesome Guy, who asks William for help to become even more awesome. After consulting the Spell Book, William performs the Spell of Exaggeration. Something goes awry and instead of becoming stronger, faster and braver, Awesome Guy is now weaker, slower and a big wimp. When sparkles gets home she helps William find out what went wrong and they discover the only way to fix things is with good old-fashioned hard work and practice.

35.title: Mary Quite Contrary
35.plot: William and Sparkles agree to mind Mary Mary Quite Contrary's prize Petunia while she's on holidays. Mary leaves them with instructions for care of her plant. When Sparkles and William read the instructions they're baffled - they are opposite to normal plant care. William and Sparkles follow them to the letter, as promised. Sure enough, Mary's Petunia starts to wilt. William and Sparkles worry that they will harm Mary's precious plant - until they remember that Mary always says the opposite to what she means! They set about fixing things and Mary comes back from ...

37.title: Show & Spell
37.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

38.title: Ringo the Ringmaster
38.plot: As Willam practices a new magic trick, he and Sparkles receive a flyer for Bungling Bros Circus Fantasticus! It will be performing in the Forest Clearing tonight. Sparkles convinces William to go with her and watch the circus setting up. Along the way the meet Ringo the circus Ringmaster who is trying to do the entire show all by himself. He tells them that his circus has 'run away' and intends starting his own circus. He recruits Sparkles and William to perform all the acts, but they make him realise that it won't work that way, but they impress Ringo when they show ...

40.title: Rain, Rain, Blow Away
40.plot: As Sparkles & William are getting ready to go on a picnic, a storm arrives bringing with it their old friend Whirly Wizard. Sparkles & William are saddened that their picnic plans have been ruined by the storm, so Whirly Wizard offers to call up a friend to blow the storm away. With Sparkles & William helping, Whirly calls up the mighty West Wind, which, not only blows the storm away but their picnic basket with it. If they want to have their picnic they'll have to find it. Sparkles and William head into the Enchanted Forest to search on foot while Whirly scouts from ...

42.title: Seek and Hide
42.plot: William and Sparkles are playing Hide and Seek outside. Sparkles is very good at hiding, but, when William hides, Sparkles finds him easily every time. While Sparkles is in the house retrieving a message from Awesome Guy, William decides to try an Invisibility Spell on himself to improve his chances. Sparkles returns in time to see William cast the Spell. The Spell fails to render William invisible, but Sparkles decides to have some fun and make him think he's invisible by pretending not to see him. At first, William enjoys 'being invisible', but soon finds it has its...

1.title: Game Play
1.plot: Sparkles and William discover that video game controllers can have some pretty powerful magic in them.

2.title: Bubble Bubble Cauldron Trouble
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: Turbo Bear's Birthday
3.plot: It's the day of Turbo Bear's birthday and William & Sparkles have been planning a surprise party. But Turbo Bear has gone missing. Will they find him in time for the party?

4.title: Galloping Gumboots
4.plot: Sparkles is trapped in a pair of enchanted runaway gumboots. Before William and Sparkles can figure how to return them to the shoemaker, the shoes run off to their next adventure.

5.title: The Magic Zoo
5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

6.title: Hurry Up and Slow Down
6.plot: It's Spring Clean time at the Star House and William and Sparkles are enthusiastic however this wears off quickly when they realise how long the job will take. Magic seems to solve the problem when William gives Sparkles a "Fairy Go Faster Spell". This creates another problem when William and Sparkles can't control their speed. It's going to take some clever magic to solve this tricky situation.

8.title: The Lost Sparkle
8.plot: Sparkles has lost her 'sparkle' and it's up to William to help her find it again.

9.title: You'll Grow Out of It
9.plot: William's third wizziversary party has just finished. His gifts include a pair of boots (that are too big) and a magical flowerpot that will grow anything you put in it! William sticks his feet in the flower and he accidentally grows into a giant! How will they get out of this very BIG mess?

10.title: Crayon Colour Crisis
10.plot: William creates an enchanted box of crayons that never runs out. But when it becomes apparent that the never ending crayons colour in more than just paper, William and Sparkles must track down the enchanted crayons and restore the Enchanted Forest back to its natural colour, and make believe are often better than reality.

11.title: Back to Back
11.plot: William and Sparkles get stuck back to back and have to learn to work together to get themselves back to normal.

12.title: Sparkles' Mystery Playmate
12.plot: Sparkles' day is livened up by a mischievous intruder when she is left at home alone. At first bored, she cheers herself up by creating a sock puppet named Stripey. Meanwhile a mouse pays a visit to the Star House and finds a cosy hiding place inside the puppet. Sparkles is very surprised when, as if by magic, her puppet appears to move all by itself. Will the mystery of Sparkles' uninvited friend be solved?

13.title: William Says
13.plot: Wanting attention and people to play with him, William makes a "William Says" Spell which gets anyone or anything to do whatever William says. It all gets out of hand when he makes Sparkles act like a monkey, the scarecrow come to life and clear out the veggie patch and makes it continuously rain down lollies.

14.title: The Missing Forest
14.plot: Something strange is happening in the Star House. Whenever William & Sparkles try to exit through the door they instantly appear back inside again. It turns out the Enchanted Forest has disappeared and the Queen of the Fairies is working hard to bring it back. Will the Queen be able to restore everything back to normal?

15.title: The Treasure Hunt
15.plot: William and Sparkles go on a treasure hunt, both take different approaches. Sparkles takes her time and reads all the clues while William, uses his new teleportation spell to get to the clues first. To finish the hunt and to get out of trouble, William and Sparkles will need to use their magic and work together if they are to enjoy the rewards of the hunt.

16.title: A Vine Mess
16.plot: Sparkles is on her way home from Fairy camp. William decides he wants to make her welcome home carrot comet cakes with carrots from the veggie patch. But he forgot to tend to the veggie patch and he finds it overgrown with vines and the scarecrow on the ground. William has to try and keep the birds away, so he becomes a scarecrow, whilst getting rid of the all tangly vines before Sparkles gets back.

17.title: The Giant Puzzle
17.plot: William and Sparkles are intrigued when they find mysterious objects with a pattern on one side and number on the other around the enchanted forest. They look like jigsaw puzzle pieces - but much larger than any jigsaw they've ever seen! Whose could they be? And how did they come to be scattered around the enchanted forest?

18.title: Awesome Obedient Guy
18.plot: When Awesome Guy pays William and Sparkles a surprise visit, he is accidentally hit by a 'Do As I Say' spell that William is practising. Its effect is to make Awesome Guy awesomely obedient - to the point that he follows William and Sparkles' every word literally, even when they don't mean it to be a command. Can William and Sparkles return Awesome Guy back to his normal self in time?

20.title: The New Wand
20.plot: The spell casting contest has come to the enchanted forest and Sparkles is keen to enter, trying her hardest to perfect her magic. Rather than continuing to practice her spells Sparkles opts for the easier solution and finds a new wand instead. But when the new wand causes problems and Sparkles soon learns that sometimes you just can't cheat hard work.

21.title: Here Comes Sprinkles
21.plot: William and Sparkles play a game of "musical magical hide and seek." William must find all the musical notes before Sparkles will reveal herself. William gets some help - and a little 'hindrance' - when Sparkles' cousin Sprinkles turns up.

22.title: When You Wish Upon a Chicken
22.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

23.title: The Magic Friendship
23.plot: Sparkles meets an adventurous young pirate named Captain Greenbeard, and learns of a mysterious boat called the Friend-Ship that transports passengers to a secret, super special friendship treasure. Together, Sparkles and Greenbeard set off on board 'The Friend-Ship' to discover that the best gift that you can give to a friend is the gift of friendship itself.

24.title: The Rhyming Curse
24.plot: After a morning stroll in the Enchanted Forest, Sparkles is helping William with some rhymes for a song he's writing. But all of a sudden she can't stop herself rhyming with everything William says! They call the Magic Doctor of the Enchanted Forest who discovers Sparkles is infected with a condition called "Rhymatism". Will he be able to cure Sparkles in time?

25.title: Jurassic Sparkles
25.plot: William and Sparkles receive an invitation to a dinosaur dinner party from a mysterious inhabitant of the enchanted forest, known as 'Fairysaurus.'

26.title: Awesome Quiz Show
26.plot: Awesome Guy gives William and Sparkles the chance to compete in his Awesome Quiz Show.

27.title: Ear Drum Hear Drum
27.plot: Sparkles discovers that William has a problem with his ears - they're HUGE! And, every sound he hears is magnified. Will the Magic Doctor of the Enchanted Forest be able to solve the problem and 'drum up' a cure?

28.title: Cirque De Sillee
28.plot: William & Sparkles decide to entertain themselves and their toys by putting on their very own Circus spectacular.

29.title: Queen VS Wild
29.plot: William and Sparkles teach the Queen of the Fairies the joys of camping. Although William and Sparkles try to show the Queen that camping is all about simplicity, she insists on doing things in the royal manner to which she's accustomed.

30.title: Baa Quack Mayhem
30.plot: The animals of the Enchanted Forest are in a muddle, and it's up to William and Sparkles, with the help of Mitch and Max, to sort them out.

1.title: Bunny Boo Boo
1.plot: The Queen of the Fairies has asked William and Sparkles to baby-sit her pet bunny. But trouble comes when William and Sparkles forget about their job and the bunny escapes. Will they find the bunny before the Queen of the Fairies calls for it?

2.title: Nature Rules
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Awful Guy
4.plot: When William runs into Awesome Guy's cousin, Awful Guy, in the Enchanted Forest, he assumes it's Awesome Guy looking unwell. Awesome Guy plays up the mistake and tricks William to go to all kinds of trouble to help 'Awesome Guy' feel well again. Will Awful Guy get away with this trick?

5.title: The Perfect Spell
5.plot: Awesome Guy wants William to perform at his birthday party, and William panics. He performs the Perfect Spell, which makes himself unable to make mistakes. Unfortunately, being perfect has some bad side effects and the Magic Doctor is called. Hopefully he can help to get William back to normal!

6.title: Hasty Daze
6.plot: The Queen of the Fairies needs some errands done and William and Sparkles are just the people for the job. But the map the Queen gives William and Sparkles blows away and they both end up in different places. One has the map and one has the list. Will they get the Queen's errands done in time? If they can just find each other they'll get the job done together in no time.

7.title: The Loudisoftus Flower
7.plot: Sparkles picks a rare flower that causes loud things to become quiet, and quiet things to become loud. After William tries to fix the volumes with a spell, Sparkles can't stop shouting. They need the Magic Doctor to help them reverse the situation with a magic potion before the Queen of the Fairies arrives for afternoon tea. Can the Magic Doctor save the day?

8.title: The Number Blunder
8.plot: William is practicing his counting for the upcoming counting contest. After he muddles up the order of the numbers from 1 to 5, he uses a homemade spell to make remembering the order much simpler. But when the spell backfires, the numbers are brought to life. After causing havoc in the Star house, the misbehaving digits escape into the Enchanted Forest, leaving William to track them down, and arrange them back into the correct order.

9.title: Dance in Your Pants
9.plot: The Queen of the Fairies has announced the annual Dance in Your Pants Dance Competition. William and Sparkles are very excited! The problem is, William has lost the ability to dance. They try various tricks to solve the problem, with unexpected results. Will their ideas work to help William dance in the competition?

10.title: Where's Turbo
10.plot: William is practicing spells in the Enchanted Forest when he accidentally makes Turbo Bear disappear. He looks for him everywhere but it seems hopeless until Awesome Guy comes along with a cute, furry teddy that he found in the Enchanted Forest. This teddy looks a lot like Turbo Bear, except for his clothes. How can William convince Awesome Guy he's got his special teddy friend?

15.title: Awesome Godfather
15.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: William and Sparkles Take the Cake
1.plot: William and Sparkles make a 'magic' cake for the Magic Doctor's birthday but it floats away, after becoming too light. After some quick thinking they end up making a Fantastic Fruity Forest Cake at the last minute.

2.title: A Trio of Sparkles
2.plot: After William goes out for the day, Sparkles soon feels the need for company and performs a spell multiplying herself and puts on a concert, starring three different sized Sparkles.

3.title: Transports of Awesomeness
3.plot: To earn a blue badge of awesomeness, Awesome Guy has to perform threerescues in one day, but with his scooter out of action can William and Sparkles help him complete his mission?

4.title: Turbo Treasure
4.plot: The Queen of the Fairies' crown has been taken by pirates. Can William, Sparkles and Awesome Guy work together to find the pirates and return the Queens' crown?

5.title: Awesome Guy V's Huggy Monster
5.plot: It's 'Visit a Friend Day' and William & Sparkles pay Huggy Monster a visit. While they are out Awesome guy arrives at the Star House for a visit. Awesome Guy can't figure out where his friends could be and wrongly decides that they must be in trouble and need rescuing.

6.title: Clean Up the Forest Day
6.plot: The Queen of the Fairies announces it is Clean Up the Forest Day. William and Sparkles have separate chores, but William gets distracted and as a result messes up both his job and Sparkles'. He has to help her to fix up the mistakes.

7.title: Ask Nature
7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: The Magic Letter Box
8.plot: Penelope Pixie is visiting everyone in the Enchanted Forest on a mission: she has a Magic Letter Box that reveals a Very Special Surprise from the Queen of the Fairies that involves a treasure hunt.

9.title: Awful Sick
9.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

10.title: Colour My World
10.plot: William and Sparkles paints have lost their colour, so they use magic to refill them from the colours outside. In doing so, they accidently take all the colours from the Enchanted Forest and everything is now grey. Can they fix the problem and restore the rainbow?

11.title: Awesome Ailen
11.plot: Awesome Guy decides to make an awesome rocket ship that will carry him into outer space, and needs William and Sparkles to help him build it. They meet a friendly alien from outer space and help their new friend too.

12.title: Wizard for a Day
12.plot: William wants to enter the World of Wizardry competition, but when the Magical Doctor visits and decides he wants to be a wizard too - things get a little complicated.

13.title: A Crafty Surprise
13.plot: Sparkles has a busy day preparing for William's surprise party; making decorations, hats and games. Not only does she need to get everything ready before the guests arrive, she has to keep William out of the Star House so he doesn't spoil the surprise.

14.title: Speak Squeak Talk Squawk
14.plot: Speak Squeak Talk Squawk flu is threatening the Enchanted Forest. The Magical Doctor needs William and Sparkles help to collect ingredients so he can make his magic potion so everyone in the Enchanted Forest doesn't get sick too.

15.title: Day All Night
15.plot: Daytime won't end because the Sun doesn't want to set. He's too caught up in how wonderful his sunlight makes everything look. Can William and Sparkles convince him to set so they, and everyone else in the Enchanted Forest can get a good nights sleep?

16.title: Music Mumbles
16.plot: William and Sparkles discover that their precious music making skills are gone - William has no rhythm, Sparkles can't sing in tune, and their ability to play instruments is all wonky and going wrong magically. How will they get their music making skills back?

17.title: Sad Socks
17.plot: While searching for costumes to wear to Awesome Guy's upcoming Awesome Dress Up Party, William and Sparkles discover a single sad sock that has come to life. Can William and Sparkles help the sad sock find its missing partner?

18.title: Colour Me Summer
18.plot: William wants it to be summer so he can go to the beach, but no matter William and Sparkles do- they do they get every season but summer.

19.title: The Great Shape Hunt
19.plot: William and Sparkles head out on the great shape hunt to find a mysterious circle shape, with a very helpful visit from Huggy Monster.

20.title: Big Red Nose
20.plot: The Magical Doctor needs help to mix up a magic potion, and William and Sparkles are up for the challenge. But they accidentaly make a mistake and turn William into a clown. How will Sparkles turn William back into his wizard self?

21.title: What O'Clock
21.plot: William and Sparkles are excited to receive an invitation to a Tea Party at the Fairy Palace - so excited they can't wait for it to start. They decide to trick the clock into thinking it's tea-time by using magic - but instead the numbers disappear from the clock.

22.title: Dr William Doolittle
22.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

23.title: Penelope Pixie: Shoe Thief
23.plot: William's and Sparkles' shoes keep vanishing. They discover that Penelope Pixie has lost the Queen of the Fairies Royal Shoes, and is collecting all the shoes in the Enchanted Forest in a bid to find them. William and Sparkles help Penelope with her problem, and she apologetically returns everybody's shoes.

24.title: The Wiz Factor
24.plot: William has to play his guitar in tonight's Talent Quest but instead of practicing he tries to take a shortcut by using magic. It causes his guitar to make strange sounds as it leads William on a merry chase through the Enchanted Forest.

25.title: A Duck to Water
25.plot: While practicing magic, William accidently turns a rubber ducky into a real duckling that runs away into the Enchanted Forest. William & Sparkles have to find the little duckling and then find a home for it.

26.title: Who's Story Is It Anyway
26.plot: Sparkles is having fun dressing up as Little Bo Peep from the nursery rhyme. When William mistakes her for the real thing she plays along for a joke, transforming herself into different characters and getting William into quite a muddle.

27.title: Fairy Salad
27.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

28.title: Dress-up Box Disaster
28.plot: The Fairy Godmother is having a "What I want to be when I grow up" fancy dress party. Sparkles cousin Sprinkles complicates the hunt for costumes and traps William and Sparkles inside the Dress-up Box. Will they get out and make it to the party in time?

29.title: The Next Level
29.plot: Sparkles is studying and practising to go to 'the next level' in being a fairy. She is very eager and excited but starts being careless, rushes and skips important steps. Will Sparklese pass her test and get to 'the next level'?

30.title: Raiders of the Veggie Patch
30.plot: Something is munching on William and Sparkles' veggie-patch. Can William and Sparkles with the help of the Scarecrow find out who is snacking on their vegetables!?

31.title: Tounge Tied Wizard
31.plot: William is requested by the Queen of the Fairies to make a public speech and Sparkles to sing a song. Sparkles practices for the event but William decides to use magic to get himself ready- but this causes some problems.

32.title: Moonbeam Muffin Maddness
32.plot: William's magic spoon is affected when Sparkles mistakenly uses it to stir her Moonbeam Muffin batter - it keeps making muffins appear. How will they fix this yummy problem?

33.title: Rainbow Cake
33.plot: Today is Sparkles birthday, and William is planning to surprise her with the bestest birthday party ever. But William accidentaly squashes the Rainbow birthday cake- will he fix the problem in time for Sparkles' party?

34.title: All for One and Three for Lunch
34.plot: William and Sparkles are minding Awesome Mouse, and take him for a picnic in the forest. They run into the Three Musketeers competing in the Musketeer games. With all the excitement- Awesome Mouse goes missing and the Three Musketeers are needed to help find him.

35.title: The Wrong Shape
35.plot: William tries to use magic as a short cut to get into better shape for an athletic competition. But this backfires and only the Magic Doctor can help William turn back to normal.

36.title: Micro Magic
36.plot: Sparkles discovers that she is too short to join William on the rides at the Fairy Fair, and uses magic to make herself taller. But her eagerness results in a magical mistake, and she is shrunk to the size of mouse. Can the Magic Doctor solve this miniature mishap?

37.title: Stay Cool
37.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

38.title: The Moon's a Balloon
38.plot: Little Bo Peep has lost her balloon and Awesome Guy is on the case. Sparkles' cardboard box rocketship offers William and Sparkles an adventure on the moon while helping search for the balloon.

39.title: Who Am I
39.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

40.title: Found & Lost
40.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

41.title: The Awesome Games
41.plot: The Awesome Games are coming up, so William and Sparkles go into training. William is determined to win and uses magic to enhance his chances. He soon learns that playing fair is a better way to go.

42.title: Whose Egg Is It Anyway
42.plot: William and Sparkles are requested by the Magical Doctor to keep a look out for a lost little baby. When they find it, it's an egg. Now they have to try to identify what animal it belongs to.

43.title: Turbo's Flying Carpet Adventure
43.plot: William is left on his own and plans to take Turbo to the beach, but how to get there? He uses magic and accidentally turns the carpet into a flying carpet and it takes off with Turbo on it. Can William rescue Turbo before its too late?

44.title: Backwards Days
44.plot: William and Sparkles cast a spell to make the Star House tidier but each time they do it, it gets messier instead. Can the Magic Doctor diagnose this magic mix up problem?

45.title: Jungle Home
45.plot: Gorilla is unwell and upset because he doesn't have a home. William and Sparkles set out to make him a home and because he's a big strong animal they build a big strong house like in the 3 Little pigs. But that's not what Gorilla wants.

-1.title: Good Golly Witch Molly
-1.plot: William & Sparkles get a visit from Auntie May's niece Molly who is not happy about being a witch and would rather be a fairy like Sparkles or a wizard like William. Feeling great, William shows off a spell he's been practising and accidentally turns Sparkles into a balloon. Only Molly's special skills can save the day!

imdb.title: Magical Tales
synopsis: Welcome to Magical Tales, the series that allows children to journey through an enchanted magical land full of exciting, funny and silly adventures where fantasy characters come to life through magic, song and dance.This exciting drama series has been designed to captivate and entertain the minds of preschool children through the use of narrative story telling, colour, movement, music and playful characters that combine to heighten the sensory experience. In each half hr episode the audience is invited into the enchanted world of Sparkles the Fairy and William the Wizard, two playful characters that use their magical talents to have fun, solve problems, help out their visiting friends and sometimes create mischief.Our two main characters are playful, magical and mischievous. The magical catch cries of Zaparoo for William, and Spa-Ling for sparkles are designed as engaging and repeatable phrases that hook young kids. When our characters really need that extra magical boost, they join forces with a super - dooper chant of Spalaroo!
